question: Which are the basin countries of the "Takutu River"?
explanation: Guyana and Brazil are the basin countries of the "Takutu River". The Takutu River is a river in the Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo Region of Guyana and Roraima in Brazil. It forms part of the boundary between the two countries. The confluence of the Takutu and Uraricoera Rivers forms the Branco River. The Takutu River Bridge establishes an all-weather road connection between Guyana and Brazil.
